persona_tip: We use Mozilla's Persona service to identify users. Why? 1/ we trust them more than ourselves to keep your password safe. 2/ as other services use this, that makes you less passwords to remember! 3/ Mozilla don't ask for any of your data. Don't have an account yet? Click the button below and follow their instructions.
